body: Why can't there be TNT maps where you make TNT cannons and spread cannons.
body_tagged: Why can't there be TNT maps where you make TNT cannons and spread cannons.
title: TNT maps

replies.body: The lag level would be over 4000.
replies.body_tagged: The lag level would be over 4000.

reply_to.body_tagged: The lag level would be over 4000.

Let's keep it at 4000. :D

replies.body: The issue isn't so much with lag. Granted, an upgraded host would be a great thing to have, but the issue that's come up in the past is that it doesn't fit the Avicus style of gameplay and the amount of teamgriefing would be pretty high. With the new addition of a big batch of Juniors to the staff team though, adding a TNT server might not be so bad, as it would bring in a lot of new players and there would probably be at least one staff member on at all times. There would need to be several maps made specifically for the TNT server, however, and how it would work would need to be decided (as in an objective system).
replies.body_tagged: The issue isn't so much with lag. With the new addition of a big batch of Juniors to the staff team though, adding a TNT server might not be so bad, as it would bring in a lot of new players and there would probably be at least one staff member on at all times. There would need to be several maps made specifically for the TNT server, however, and how it would work would need to be decided (as in an objective system).

replies.body: There aren't enough mods to deal with team griefers.
replies.body_tagged: There aren't enough mods to deal with team griefers.

replies.body: We do have maps that incorporate TNT that have been tested and work well, but we are not sure whether we are ready to introduce them to the public domain.
replies.body_tagged: We do have maps that incorporate TNT that have been tested and work well, but we are not sure whether we are ready to introduce them to the public domain.

replies.body: If you wish to test maps, you gotta wait until map events come out.
